document.full_text: a reporter who covered neo-nazis in california describes his impressions of the world of jeff hall, a neo-nazi leader who the police say was killed by his 10-year-old son.
document.title: reporter's notebook: domesticity and radicalism clash in a neo-nazi home
lines_and_colors: a reporter who covered neo-nazis in california describes his impressions of the world of jeff hall, a neo-nazi leader who the police say was killed by his 10-year-old son.
